    • Field Detail

      • store

        private ResultStorage store
        Represents the access to the previous results. Uses ResultStorage to view any previous results that entities have had with the user.

      • currentNode

        private int currentNode
        Represents the current node in the ResultStorage. This indicates where the entity should look for this set of Result.

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • setResult

        public void setResult()
        Sets the result depending on previous values that the user has used on this combination of results. If none exist for this combination then choose a random value
        Specified by:
        setResult in class Entity

      • getRandomChoice

        private int getRandomChoice(int rock,
                  int paper,
                  int scissors)
        Gets a random chance for each value depending on the weight of each choice The user may have chosen rock 8 times, and chosen both paper and scissors once this would give rock 80% to be picked and 10% each to the others
        Parameters:
        rock - indicates how many rocks have been chosen
        paper - indicates how many papers have been chosen
        scissors - indicates how many scissors have been chosen
        Returns:
        the choice chosen, 1 = rock, 2 = paper, 3 = scissors

      • moveNode

        private void moveNode(int result)
        Moves the node that the Entity is currently looking at depending on the previous result
        Parameters:
        result - indicates the result of the previous round, 1 = lose 2 = draw, 3 = win

      • update

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        result - indicates what the result of the previous round
